      • IMAGEINFO_HELP_COUNTDOWN

        public static final org.openstreetmap.josm.data.preferences.IntegerProperty IMAGEINFO_HELP_COUNTDOWN
        The number of times the help popup for the ImageInfoPanel will be displayed. But regardless of this number, the popup will only show up at most once between two (re)starts of JOSM. Or opening the ImageInfoPanel immediately brings this number down to zero.
